divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my garage working on my car late and I went out side for some fresh air around 2 am and I happened to notice a flashing light in the distance ! At fist I thought that it was just a plane probably passing by, but then I noticed that it wasn't moving at all! It's now 3 am and it still hasn't moved at all and it keeps flashing every 3 seconds! It is a very noticeable flashing light! This hasn't happened before so I'm continuing to watch it .
